title: Xvalidators-dependent-root-enabled issue
body:
### Description
Issue: when I use `--Xvalidators-dependent-root-enabled` I get regular disconnects of the connection between beacon node and validator node. No issues without this option so far.

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. Enable `--Xvalidators-dependent-root-enabled` function in settings.
2. Get regular disconnects between Beacon and validator node.

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]
Normal work

**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]
Regular disconnects between beacon and validator node

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
Every few minutes

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: [`v21.1.0`]
* Hash commit: [`dcfb0ebeab457f818ec8b9afadf2faf78c4bd1e0 `]
